title: Passion's Embrace
description: A Taste of Heaven...When beautiful Katie Lee Holden lost everything, masterful Bruce Cabot came to her rescue. But Katie Lee was determined to forge her destiny alone—and light up the stage of glittering turn-of-the-century Seattle. No one would stop her...not even the man she loved.To Bruce, Katie Lee was a pure and brilliant diamond. He vowed to make her his wife—before her sparkle was tarnished by unscrupulous men.They shared the embrace of eternal desire. But would they ever share one another's dreams?
author: Cassie Edwards
